headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Accomplished Master Criminal
content:
Each Heist Finale has an Elite Challenge for fulfilling certain criteria, designed to only be achieved by the very best Heist crews.

This isnâ€™t only about speed; you must complete all the target objectives to earn the bonus. Teamwork is the key to success.

If your crew has what it takes, you could bag yourself some extra loot. Keep an eye out on the end of Heist result screens to see how you fared.
